channel.title: Posts on Yiyi Wang

item.description:
About me

Hi everyone, I’m Yiyi Wang, a Ph.D. student in University of South Florida. Currently, I am in Pi Lab, under the supervision of Prof. Jiajun Huang. I got my bachelor degree in Computer Science and Technology at School of Computing, Wuhan University. I got my master degree in Language Technology at University of Gothenburg.

Education

B.Eng in Computer Science and Technology (2019) –Wuhan University Master in Language Technology (2025) –University of Gothenburg
